function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close physical interaction in service industries increases the risk of contagious diseases propagation.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and higher risk of infection for both service providers and customers.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, promoting use of personal protective equipment, and redesigning service delivery processes to minimize physical interaction.","Technologies":"UV sanitation devices, contactless payment systems, and digital service platforms.","People":"Service providers and customers in industries such as airlines, hair salons, educational establishments, health care facilities, restaurants, retail stores, gymnasiums, and banking services.","Owner":"Service organizations and regulatory authorities."}]}
